overview:
Cristi is Co-Founder, Product Development Manager at HouseFix, and owner of TenetGroup, an import/export business.

Cristi started his career helping global shipping and distribution company TNT grow its network in Transylvania. He followed through as technical implementation lead at Bogdan Voda University, where he grew through the ranks to become general manager. Afterwards, he started his own company in Romania, providing technology services to small and medium-sized businesses. Being involved in politics, he was voted the President of the Democratic Party in his county, Maramures. After he moved to United States, he was involved in HVAC and construction contracting for the residential and commercial markets.
